column5: Hey guys thinking of going and fishing the holland river just below bridge st (hwy 11) or down river at the metal barrier where the river T's off. Any experience fishing there or has anyone heard stories of people catching and fishing it during the hardwater season? Thanks

Hey guys thinking of going and fishing the holland river just below bridge st (hwy 11) or down river at the metal barrier where the river T's off. Any experience fishing there or has anyone heard stories of people catching and fishing it during the hardwater season? Thanks  You won't be getting a response from Old Ironmaker I bet.
Ive never fished it during winter, i guess you might be able to get perch or pike but i think there are better spots to try.
I drive by frequently,never see a hut or anyone fishing.Maybe my timing?,think I would of seen one sometime.As said,better places for sure in the winter.
You won't be getting a response from Old Ironmaker I bet.   As to your question,cant say I have seen or heard of anyone fishing it through the ice.
May need a smitty with a tow bar.
